issue.title: Building Editor: Add XY hotkeys for moving objects in 2D View

content.raw:
I'm not sure what the state is here, and this is lower priority. 
Just an idea for now: Is it possible to use Shift as the hotkey here for both? If the user begins dragging an object along the X axis and holds Shift, we constrain to X axis. Likewise for Y.
